thread.title: LIVE: Quetta win toss, elect to field first against Lahore - The Express Tribune
thread.title_full: LIVE: Quetta win toss, elect to field first against Lahore - The Express Tribune

author: Sports Desk
title: LIVE: Quetta win toss, elect to field first against Lahore - The Express Tribune
text:
Share Tweet Email PHOTO COURTESY: PCB 
Quetta Gladiators won the toss and decided to field first against Lahore Qalandars on Saturday at the Sharjah Cricket Ground in their Pakistan Super League (PSL) tie. 
Quetta, who suffered their first loss in the second edition of the PSL against Islamabad United and had to share points with Peshawar Zalmi in the subsequent match after rain forced the game to be abandoned on Friday, would be looking to go top of the table today.. 
On the other hand, Lahore would be hoping to build on their momentum and string two successive wins for the first time in the tournament against Quetta. 
Teams 
Quetta Gladiators 
Saad Nasim, Ahmed Shehzad, Kevin Pietersen, Rilee Rossouw, Sarfraz Ahmed (c), Mahmudullah, Thisara Perera, Mohammad Nawaz, Anwar Ali, Hasan Khan, Zulfiqar Babar. 
Lahore Qalandars 
Jason Roy, Brendon McCullum, Fakhar Zaman, Cameron Delport, Umar Akmal, Mohammad Rizwan, Sunil Narine, Sohail Tanvir, Bilawal Bhatti, Mohammad Irfan Jr, Yasir Shah. 
Toss: Quetta won the toss and elected to field first against Lahore
